class.name: moveit_task_constructor/Current State
class.description: Use the current state of the robot (when starting planning) as a target.

class.name: moveit_task_constructor/GraspProviderDefault
class.description: Default Grasp provider stage plugin implementing the functionality of the GenerateGraspPose stage

class.name: moveit_task_constructor/GraspProviderFixedPoses
class.description: Grasp Provider plugin for setting a set of grasp poses

class.name: moveit_task_constructor/PlaceProviderDefault
class.description: Default Place provider stage plugin implementing the functionality of the GeneratePlacePose stage

class.name: moveit_task_constructor/PlaceProviderFixedPoses
class.description: Place Provider plugin for setting a set of place poses
